about: Create a new bug report

**Describe the bug**
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

**Log file location**
Provide a link to your log file located at _Steam\SteamApps\common\Cities_Skylines\Cities_Data\output_log.txt_ after it has been uploaded to Google Drive or PasteBin or another text sharing website.

**Screenshots**
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.
